title: Ban this person
body: the sivir in my match history, i smashed her in the game i played for the last, then she got slaty and raged and fed intentionally all game because i take a couple of kills accidentally. this is ridiculous, apparently me getting kills because vayne tumbles through my ult is "acting like an asshole". idk why players feel the need for every kill ever, she even raged when shaco and i dived a tower to get a kill and she didnt get it. hy the fuck would you not ban her. i love this community.

replies.body: How do you know she is a witch?
